```{r}
library(tidyverse)
## Reduce panel to only counties where yield is reported in a county-year
yield <- readRDS("./data/yield-modeling-panel.RDS")
yield <- as.data.frame(yield)
cty <- readRDS("./data/county.RDS")
cty <- as.data.frame(cty)
coterm <- yield %>% filter(GEOID %in% cty$GEOID) # check

  
yield <- yield %>% filter(!is.na(YIELD)) # reduces to 17038 unique county-year observations

y_missing <- coterm %>% filter(GEOID %in% yield$GEOID)

y_count <- yield %>% mutate(count = 1) %>% group_by(GEOID) %>% summarize(count = sum(count))
```
